procedure.title: Upgrading to &abbrev; &version;
procedure.para: To upgrade to &abbrev; &version;, complete the following steps:

step.para: Download the new installer package from &mybalabit;. Use the same package type as you used for the installation (for example, use the .run package for the upgrade if you have originally installed &abbrev; using a .run installer).
Download the new license file from &mybalabit;.
Install &abbrev; and check the warnings. Upgrade the respective parts of your configuration if needed.
On the host where you are running &abbrev; in server mode, replace the old license file with the new one.

warning.para: Hazard of data loss! Without the new license file, &abbrev; will run in relay mode, and will not store the incoming messages locally.

step.para: Set the version of the configuration file to &techversion;.
